summary: A test suite that verifies the PulseBackendConfiguration class correctly exposes hardware characteristics such as channel mappings, sample rates, repetition settings, Hamiltonian information, processor type, supported instructions, and scaling factors, and also checks proper copying and internal list handling using mocked Pulse backends.
business_intent: Provide automated validation to guarantee that backend configuration objects accurately reflect quantum hardware specifications, preventing regressions and ensuring dependable integration for developers and users of the Qiskit pulse framework.
